Detailed Description

FM Bi-partitioning Manager Utility. Provide service such that calculate cut cost, constraint checking etc. This class could also be the base class of the multilevel bi-partitioning manager.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

FMBiPartMgrBase::FMBiPartMgrBase ( const FMParam &  param) [protected]

Constructor

Long function is bad. It makes other people difficult to understand the code and hard to maintain. I sometimes also write long functions. The excuse usually is the gain of run-time performance, even the function only contribute a very small portion of total run-time. Since C++ provides the inline function method, it should not be an excuse anymore. Constructor
